## Fireball Crit Chance

Shows the crit chance of your Fireball, as modified by
`Enhanced Pyrotechnics`.

![Screenshot](./screenshot.png?raw=true)

**Dev status**: Release

**Classes**: Mage (Fire)

**Requested by**: Kildon
